explains: adj. 专心的；纯真的；真诚的；率直的

sentences.en: You've got to be fairly single-minded about it.
sentences.cn: 你必须对此事专心一些。

sentences.en: She is very single-minded about her career.
sentences.cn: 她一心专注于自己的事业。

sentences.en: They were effective politicians, ruthless and single-minded in their pursuit of political power.
sentences.cn: 他们是注重实效的政治家，无情而专注地追逐着政治权力。
